name: VillagePilage
description:
This game is for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

I only had three hours to work on the game due to work, but I took the theme and made a defense game where you are supposed to defend your village from attacking orcs, with the help from your fellow villagers.

CONTROLS:

 WASD - To move

Arrow Keys - To shoot

Click on the white circles surrounding the player to enlist the help of allies

Known bugs:

-Player cant die

-Bullets stop moving when all enemy's are dead

-All sounds, music and animations aren't working (   :(    )
